name: The Myth Of Happiness
description:
The myth of happiness is an adventure platformer 2D game where you are having a fight inside your mind against all what causes you depression like loneliness , break ups... in order to achieve happiness and cure your sadness.

-Use the mouse to point the gun at your enemies.

-"Left mouse button" to shoot.

-"Right mouse button" to call clouds : the clouds are a mechanic that makes you able to move around freely, also could be used for a lot of things when you master it.

-"A" and "D" to move left and right.

-"W" to jump.

    I hope you enjoy! 

Tips: 

-When you find that you are in a wide space and there is nothing look go up and down there should be a platform nearby.

-The cake makes you immortal for 20 seconds.
